subject: Junit for struts Action class and Business Delegate
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using JMock api for writing Junits. Can anyone tell me how to write junits using JMock for struts Action class and Business Delegate. Also the action
messageBody:
Hi,
I am using JMock api for writing Junits. Can anyone tell me how to
